gameDescriptions.start: The princess of the kingdom of CPeria has been captured by an evil wizard and placed in a castle guarded by monsters. Your job is to set her free and bring her back outside the castle. There are 9 rooms in the castle and one exit to it. Rooms have tresaure and weapons too. So do you have the potential to destroy the monster and save Princess Zelda? Are you ready? Lets do it!
gameDescriptions.endWin: You rescued the princess and exit the castle. You Win!
gameDescriptions.endLose: You exit the castle without rescuing the princess. You Lose!
gameDescriptions.endDead: The monster killed you. You are dead. Try Again!
